components.description:
A square icon with rounded sides containing the letters "VS". Generally depicted as being orange in color.

Used to represent a contest between two sides, such as in competitive sports.
components.title: Squared Vs

description:
A square icon with rounded sides containing the letters "VS". Generally depicted as being orange in color.

title: Squared Vs

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Enclosed Alphanumeric Supplement -> Squared Latin letter sequences
emoji_net_data.definition: VS Button was approved as part of Unicode 6.0 in 2010 under the name ‚ÄúSquared Vs‚Äù and added to Emoji 1.0 in 2015. Copy and paste this emoji: http://emojipedia.org/squared-vs/
emoji_net_data.name: VS button

bn:13677131a: Being in the state of competition (often unintentionally)

bn:00085468v: Compete for something; engage in a contest; measure oneself against others

apple_vendor_description: The 'VS' button emoji on Apple devices is a bold, striking graphic designed to ignite competition and comparison. Its segmented design, featuring crisp white 'VS' lettering against a vibrant red background, is infused with Apple's characteristic glossy 3D shading and soft rounded edges for a tactile feel. This emoji on Apple devices powerfully symbolizes a showdown, a rivalry, or a choice between two options, adding an energetic and decisive tone to messages.
